h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: This is because fighting in the mud will drastically slow any dodge roll you try to make to get out of the way of his attacks. You can alleviate this somewhat with the help of one of the Sages Relic's passive buffs, or a particular gourd soak, but they won't put you back on even footing.
